revised_title: Eddy Motion and Temperature Distribution in the Atmosphere
tldr: The authors investigate the effect of eddy motion on wind velocity, temperature, and humidity in the atmosphere. They propose a method to calculate the rate of heat transfer across a horizontal area using eddy motion and develop a formula for the propagation of heat by eddies in the atmosphere. The study provides insights into the relationship between eddy motion, temperature distribution, and heat transfer in the atmosphere.
